# Multi-Purpose Components

Reusable patterns with a higher level of detail baked in.

Allows for locally scoped options such as:

.--lg, .--sm, and .w--50, .w--1/3@t, etc.

  • Accordions
  • Badges
  • Breadcrumb
  • Buttons
  • Cards
  • Columns
  • List Groups

  • Mastheads
  • Media Objects
